buffalo3d.interfaces

Interface IObject3dContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IObject3dParent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Box, HollowCylinder, Object3dContainer, Rectangle, Scene, ScrollContainer, SkyBox, Sphere, Torus

    public interface IObject3dContainer
extends IObject3dParent
    Using Actionscript 3 nomenclature for what are essentially "pass-thru" methods to an underlying ArrayList

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChild(Object3d $child)
      Adds a child object.
      void addChildAt(Object3d $child, int $index)
      Adds a child object with specified position.
      Object3d getChildAt(int $index)
      Returns the object at the specified position in the group.
      Object3d getChildByName(String $name)
      Returns the object with the matched name in the group.
      int getChildIndexOf(Object3d $child)
      Returns the position index of specified child object.
      int numChildren()
      Returns the number of children in the group.
      void removeAllChildren()
      Call this method to remove all child object from the Container.
      boolean removeChild(Object3d $child)
      Removes the specified child.
      Object3d removeChildAt(int $index)
      Removes the child with specified position.

      • Methods inherited from interface buffalo3d.interfaces.IObject3dParent

        clearChildFocus, focusableObjectAvailable, focusSearch, getParent, requestChildFocus

    • Method Detail

      • addChild

        void addChild(Object3d $child)
        Adds a child object. (Not recommend call it out of GL thread)
        Parameters:
        $child - the child object to be added

      • addChildAt

        void addChildAt(Object3d $child,
                int $index)
        Adds a child object with specified position. (Not recommend call it out of GL thread)
        Parameters:
        $child - the child object to add
        $index - the position at which to add the child

      • removeChild

        boolean removeChild(Object3d $child)
        Removes the specified child. (Not recommend call it out of GL thread)
        Parameters:
        $child - the child object to remove

      • removeChildAt

        Object3d removeChildAt(int $index)
        Removes the child with specified position. (Not recommend call it out of GL thread)
        Parameters:
        $index - the child object to remove
        Returns:
        true if removing is successful.

      • removeAllChildren

        void removeAllChildren()
        Call this method to remove all child object from the Container.

      • getChildAt

        Object3d getChildAt(int $index)
        Returns the object at the specified position in the group. (Not recommend call it out of GL thread)
        Parameters:
        $index - the position at which to get the object from
        Returns:
        the object at the specified position or null if the position does not exist within the group

      • getChildByName

        Object3d getChildByName(String $name)
        Returns the object with the matched name in the group. (Not recommend call it out of GL thread)
        Parameters:
        $name - name of the child which to get
        Returns:
        the object at the specified position or null if the position does not exist within the group

      • getChildIndexOf

        int getChildIndexOf(Object3d $child)
        Returns the position index of specified child object. (Not recommend call it out of GL thread)
        Parameters:
        $child - specified child object
        Returns:
        index the position at which to get the object from

      • numChildren

        int numChildren()
        Returns the number of children in the group. (Not recommend call it out of GL thread)
        Returns:
        a positive integer representing the number of children in the group
